name: QuakeShelter/Collaps
description:
QuakeShelter

This game is inspired by the idea of Life Triangle during an earthquake. I was really interested with the physic system of Unity so I hope to make some good use of it into games. In this project- the QuakeShelter, the players will be controlling a safe-test dummy bot placed in an earthquake simulator where they need to build gather items and build up their own shelter in 90 seconds.

Control:

WASD to move

Space to jump

E to select

Mouse scroll/ Left& Right mouse button/ left shift & left ctrl to rotate selected objects
